title: Long History Of Shootings In US Presidential Politics
content: Shots were fired during a rally speech by Donald Trump, in an incident that investigators are treating as a possible assassination attempt on the former president.
summary: Shots were fired during a rally speech by Donald Trump, in an incident that investigators are treating as a possible assassination attempt on the former president.

title: "Violence Has No Place In Politics": PM Condemns Attack On "Friend" Trump

title: Ivanka Trump's 'Thank You' Note For Secret Service After Shooting At Rally
content: Donald Trump, former US president, was hit in the ear in an apparent assassination attempt by a gunman at a rally in Pennsylvania today, a shocking incident that will fuel fears of instability ahead of the 2024 US presidential election.

title: Pics Show Chaos, Panic At Trump Rally As Bullets Flew By
content: Former US President Donald Trump was hit in the ear in an apparent assassination attempt by a gunman at a campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania today.The gunman and a spectator have been killed and two others critically injured.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump was hit in the ear in an apparent assassination attempt by a gunman at a campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania today.The gunman and a spectator have been killed and two others critically injured.

title: Photo Shows Bullet Inches From Donald Trump's Face At US Rally
content: Former US president Donald Trump was shot at while he was addressing a campaign rally in Pennsylvania ahead of the US presidential elections. The 78-year-old leader hid behind the podium on stage as several shots rang out at the rally.
summary: Former US president Donald Trump was shot at while he was addressing a campaign rally in Pennsylvania ahead of the US presidential elections. The 78-year-old leader hid behind the podium on stage as several shots rang out at the rally.

title: Gaza Talks On Halt, Israel Not Serious, Say Egyptian Sources
content: Gaza ceasefire talks have been halted after three days of intense negotiations failed to produce a viable outcome, two Egyptian security sources said on Saturday, blaming Israel for lacking a genuine intent to reach agreement.
summary: Gaza ceasefire talks have been halted after three days of intense negotiations failed to produce a viable outcome, two Egyptian security sources said on Saturday, blaming Israel for lacking a genuine intent to reach agreement.

title: Multiple Shots Came From "Elevated Position": Secret Service As Trump Injured
content: The apparent assassination attempt on Donald Trump involved "multiple shots (fired) toward the stage from an elevated position outside the rally venue," the US Secret Service said today.
summary: The apparent assassination attempt on Donald Trump involved "multiple shots (fired) toward the stage from an elevated position outside the rally venue," the US Secret Service said today.

title: What US Secret Service Said After Attack On Trump During Campaign Rally
content: Former US President Donald Trump was shot at an election rally in a possible assassination attempt just a day before the Republican Party is scheduled to begin its convention to formally declare him its nominee for the White House.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump was shot at an election rally in a possible assassination attempt just a day before the Republican Party is scheduled to begin its convention to formally declare him its nominee for the White House.

title: Trump Rally Suspected Shooter Was Outside Venue, Says Local Prosecutor
content: The alleged shooter who injured US presidential candidate Donald Trump at a rally in Pennsylvania was outside the event grounds, a local prosecutor said Saturday, adding that the suspect was dead.
summary: The alleged shooter who injured US presidential candidate Donald Trump at a rally in Pennsylvania was outside the event grounds, a local prosecutor said Saturday, adding that the suspect was dead.

title: Witness Claims He Saw Shooter Positioned On Roof Before He Fired At Trump
content: A witness has claimed that he saw the man - who fired at Donald Trump while he was addressing a campaign rally - positioned on the roof of a building near the venue.
summary: A witness has claimed that he saw the man - who fired at Donald Trump while he was addressing a campaign rally - positioned on the roof of a building near the venue.

title: Donald Trump Injured In Assassination Bid At Rally: What We Know So Far
content: Shots were fired at a campaign rally where former US President and Republican candidate Donald Trump was addressing a gathering in Pennsylvania on Sunday. Trump, who was seen with blood on his ear, is "safe" after he was rushed off stage.
summary: Shots were fired at a campaign rally where former US President and Republican candidate Donald Trump was addressing a gathering in Pennsylvania on Sunday. Trump, who was seen with blood on his ear, is "safe" after he was rushed off stage.

title: Donald Trump Says Bullet Pierced Part Of Right Ear, Saved By Secret Service
content: Former US President Donald Trump said that a bullet pierced the upper part of his right ear during a a campaign rally on Saturday in Pennsylvania.

title: "No Place For This Kind Of Violence": Biden On Shooting At Trump Rally

title: Suspected Shooter Among 2 Dead At Trump Rally, Blood Seen On Ex President's Ear

title: Brain-Eating Amoeba Kills Pak Man After He Went Swimming: Report
content: In a rare occurrence, a 22-year-old man died of primary amoebic meningoencephalitis (PAM) in Pakistan's Karachi, taking the tally of casualties to three this year, ARY News reported.
summary: In a rare occurrence, a 22-year-old man died of primary amoebic meningoencephalitis (PAM) in Pakistan's Karachi, taking the tally of casualties to three this year, ARY News reported.

title: OpenAI Whistleblowers Seek Probe Into "Restrictive Non-Disclosures": Report
content: OpenAI whistleblowers have filed a complaint with the US Securities and Exchange Commission, calling for a probe over the company's "restrictive non-disclosure agreements", the Washington Post reported, citing a copy of the letter sent to the SEC.
summary: OpenAI whistleblowers have filed a complaint with the US Securities and Exchange Commission, calling for a probe over the company's "restrictive non-disclosure agreements", the Washington Post reported, citing a copy of the letter sent to the SEC.

title: Is Biden Competent For 2nd Term? Health Experts Call Out "Raging Ageism"
content: As Biden's verbal gaffes, shaky voice, and other troubling signs have brought an intense focus on the President's mental acuity, experts are calling on him and Trump to pass additional cognitive tests, while warning against leaping to conclusions.
summary: As Biden's verbal gaffes, shaky voice, and other troubling signs have brought an intense focus on the President's mental acuity, experts are calling on him and Trump to pass additional cognitive tests, while warning against leaping to conclusions.
